description: Creation of a basement with front light well, erection of  a single storey rear extension, rear outrigger roof extension, increase in height of the rear infill extension and lowering of ground floor level.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (E00, E01, E02, E03, E04, E06, E07, E08, E09,   unnumbered location plan, construction method statement - received 04/01/2021
P00 Rev 02, P01 Rev 02, P02 Rev 02, P04 Rev 02, P05 Rev 02 , P07 Rev 02, P09 Rev 02 and D0X- received 17/03/2021
P03 Rev 04 and P06 Rev 04- received 31/03/2021) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.
Condition : 5 - The basement hereby permitted shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation.

Condition : 6 - No excavation or construction work shall be undertaken prior to the submission and approval in writing by the Local Planning Authority of a Construction Logistics Plan which will include delivery timings, construction traffic routes, construction traffic washing, public highway cleaning, dust suppression, noise suppression, construction waste disposal.

Condition : 7 - The windows formed in the eastern elevation shall be obscure glazed up to 1.7m from finished floor levels, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
Condition : 8 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
